short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension is used to build an adaptor for your store to integrate with Fanplayr.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension should be used with a Fanplayr (fanplayr.com) account to create an adaptor to track users on your e-commerce site.

For documentation on how to use this extension please see:
https://fanplayr.gitbooks.io/adapter-wizard/content/
